price: همدا ستاسي رب دى، د هر شي پيدا كوونكى، له هغه پرته بل الله نشته، نو تاسي كوم خواته ګرځول كېږئ.
arabic: ذَٰلِكُمُ ٱللَّهُ رَبُّكُمۡ خَٰلِقُ كُلِّ شَيۡءٖ لَّآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَۖ فَأَنَّىٰ تُؤۡفَكُونَ

version.title: Pashto Translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into Pashto language, translated by the team of the Rowad Translation Center in cooperation with IslamHouse.com.

meta.transliteration: dhālikumu al-lahu rabbukum khāliqu kulli shayin lā ilāha illā huwa fa-annā tu'fakūna
